name: Zero Maida Bread - 100% Whole Wheat
description: The best thing since sliced bread. No refined flour, just 100% whole wheat goodness. Zero Maida, No Preservatives.

name: Zero Maida Bread - 100% Whole Wheat (Large)
description: Larger loaf of our classic zero maida whole wheat bread.

name: Zero Maida Multigrain Bread
description: Zero maida with the goodness of multiple grains for added fiber and nutrition.

name: Multi Protein Bread
description: India's first high-protein bread. Contains whey, soy, and pea protein. 10.4g protein per 2 slices. 300% more protein than regular bread.

name: Vegan Protein Bread
description: 100% Plant-based high protein bread. Light on fluff, heavy on health.

name: Zero Maida Bombay Pav
description: Your favorite pav, but healthy. Zero maida, no preservatives.

name: Zero Maida Burger Bun
description: Guilt-free burger buns made without refined flour.
